text: Nimage tiḷidirali; avaru avaninda aḍagisalikkāgi tam'ma hr̥dayagaḷannu muccikoḷḷuttāre. Nimage tiḷidirali; avaru tam'ma uḍupugaḷinda tam'mannu muccikoṇḍiruvāgalū, avaru guptavāgiḍuva mattu avaru bahiraṅga paḍisuva ellavannū avanu aritiruttāne. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū avanu manas'sināḷadalliruva viṣayagaḷannū ballavanu
